Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Komla Dumor's former colleagues reflect on the late broadcaster's talent
BBC News na-achọ onye ntaakụkọ si mpaghara Afrịka ga-amụke ka ọnwa na kpakpando n'ihe nrite Komla Dumor nke afọ a bụ nke asatọ.
A na-akpọku ndi ntaakụkọ si mpaghara Afrịka niile ka ha tinye akwụkwọ isonye n'ihe nrite a, bụ nke ga-ekpuhe ma kwalite ọnatarachi dị n'Afrịka.
Onye meriri ga-anọ ọnwa atọ n'isiụlọọrụ BBC dị na Lọndọn, ebe ọ ga-amụta ọtụtụ ihe dị iche iche.
Ohere itinye akwụkwọ ga-akwụsị n'ụbọchị 14 Febụwarị 2023, n'elekere 23:59 GMT.
E hiwere ihe nrite a iji kwanyere Komla Dumor bụ nwafọ Ghana, onye ntaakụkọ na mgbasaozi n'ihe onyonyo BBC World News ugwu, bụkwanụ onye nwụrụ na mberede mgbe ọ gbachara afọ 41 n'afọ 2014.
Nwunye Dumor bụ Kwansema Dumor sị na obi juru ya afọ n'ọrụ di ya rụrụ n'ụlọọrụ BBC ma sịkwa na ezinaụlọ ya "na-ekele BBC maka icheta ya" site n'ịhazi ihe nrite a.
BBC na-arịọ ka ndị ntaakụkọ si mpaghara Afrịka tinye akwụkwọ maka ihe nrite a, bụ nke ga-akwalite ma kwanyere ndị ntaakụkọ pụrụiche bi ma na-arụ ọrụ n'Afrịka ugwu.
N'ịgbakwụnyere ọzụzụ a ga-enye onye meriri, onye ahụ ga-aga otu mba Afrịka mee akụkọ ha nyochapụtara bụ nke a ga-agbasa n'ọbaozi BBC n'ụwa gbaa gburugburu.
Dịka onye a ma ama n'ịgbasa akụkọ n'ụzọ pụrụiche nakwa mmasị o nwere n'ịkọ akụkọ banyere Afrịka, Dumor mere ihe gbapụtara ihe n'Afrịka nakwa mbaụwa.
BBC ekpebiela ịganihu n'ịkwanyere Dumor ugwu a site n'ịkwado ndị ntaakụkọ si na mpaghara Afrịka ka ha na-akọ akụkọ ndị pụrụiche banyere Afrịka ka ụwa tụrụ lee.
Chọpụtakwuo banyere ihe nrite ka ị maara ma itozuruoke isonye
Nwafọ mba Zambian na-agbasa ozi na TV bụ Dingindaba Jonah Buyoya meriri n'ihe nrite a afọ gara aga - onye mbụ ga-erite ya site na mpaghara Ndịda Afrịka.
N'oge ọzụzụ ya, ọ gara na mba Seychelles ịkọ akụkọ banyere etu osisi ndị a kụrụ na mba mmiri ga-esi enye aka ịbelata mgbanwe ihu eluigwe (climate change).
"Ndụ Komla Dumor kpalitere mmụọ m, ya mere irite ma soro na nkwanye ugwu a bụ nnukwu ihe nkwanye ugwu nye m," Ka Buyoya kwuru.
"Ana m agba ndị ntaakụkọ si Afrịka ume ka ha tinye akwụkwọ maka ihe nrite a; ọ bụ ụzọ dị mma e ji amụta ihe ma wulite amamihe e ji akọ akụkọ ndị pụrụiche banyere Afrịka."
Liliane Landor, onye ji ọkwa 'senior controller n'ụlọọrụ BBC News kwuru: "Ihe nrite a na ndị ritere ya na mbụ bụ ihe ịgba akaebe na mmasị Komla nwere iji ugwu na eziokwu akọ akụkọ banyere Afrịka."

Dumor bụbu onye na-agbasa ozi n'emume Focus on Africa, igwe mgbasaozi na TV nke mbụ BBC hiwere naanị maka ndị Afrịka. A na-agbasa ozi a n'ọbaozi TV nke BBC World News, bụ nke a ga-achịkọ ya na BBC News Channel ọnụ dị ka afọ a na-aga n'ihu iji hiwe ọbaozi ọhụrụ.
O so kwa n'otu n'ime ndị mgbasaozi na BBC World News' ngalaba European a na-eme n'ụtụtụ.
O banyere n'ọrụ BBC n'afọ 2007 n'ime ọtụtụ afọ ọ rụchara ọrụ dịka onye ntaakụkọ na mba Ghana, bụ ebe o ritere nzere onye ntaakụkọ kachasị ibe na Ghana.
Site n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2009 ọ na-agbasa ozi n'emume 'Network Africa' nke BBC World Service, tupu ọ banye n'emume 'The World Today'.

N'afọ 2009 Dumor bụ onye mbụ ga-agbasa ozi n'emume 'African business na BBC World News, Africa Business (akụkọ banyere azụmaahịa n'Afrịka). O mere njem gaa mba Afrịka dị iche iche, ebe o zutere ndị bụ ọkaibe n'azụmaahịa ma kọọ akụkọ banyere ọtụtụ azụmaahịa na-ewu ewu n'Afrịka.
N'afọ 2013 aha Dumor pụtara n'akwụkwọ New African magazine' dịka otu n'ime mmadụ 100 kachasị gbapụta ihe n'Afrịka.
Ndị ritere ya na mbụ:
Nancy Kacungira onye Uganda
Didi Akinyelure onye Naịjirịa
Amina Yuguda onye Naịjirịa
Waihiga Mwaura onye Kenya
Solomon Serwanjja onye Uganda
Victoria Rubadiri onye Kenya
Dingindaba Jonah Buyoya onye Zambia
West Africa
Afịrịka
South Africa
